item.title: By: Harry Ford
item.dc:creator: Harry Ford
item.description:
Thankyou kind Sir for including my site. Really like Joe Lifrieri site 'Hugs for Monsters' nice and fun & easy to navigate.
Like the idea Colmar Brunton's site also straight to the point but as I didn't know what they do I found myself slightly confused.
item.content:encoded:
Thankyou kind Sir for including my site. Really like Joe Lifrieri site ‘Hugs for Monsters’ nice and fun & easy to navigate.

Like the idea Colmar Brunton’s site also straight to the point but as I didn’t know what they do I found myself slightly confused.
